label: Homepage
title: MEXT Official Documentation
description: The is the official documentation for the MEXT platform.

items.title: Easy to Use
items.description: Our platform was designed from the ground up to be easily used to get your metaverse up and running quickly.

items.title: Focus on What Matters
items.description: MEXT lets you focus on your needs, and we'll do the chores.

items.title: Powered by AI
items.description: Our AI-driven avatar instantly transforms into an intelligent assistant, adept at aiding you in 3D space management and serving as your virtual representative.
